item.description:
Come hear/see our own Kate Racculia read from her BRAND NEW NOVEL, This Must Be the Place!!! We are very proud of her and will probably be heading out to celebrate (with or without our famous member) afterward for a drink or two to talk about how we all can become successful, too.

Pre-order at http://www.amazon.com... or support your local bookstore and buy that night!

Either way, I'm sure Kate will sign the book for you and then it'll be worth millions. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll sit in the FRONT! With pom-poms! Okay no pom-poms. But front, yeah.
item.name: BOSTON WRITER'S MEMBER SUPER SUCCESSFUL: STORY AT 7
